TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SoapException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: Represents the exception that is thrown when an XML Web service method is called over SOAP and an exception occurs.

span.span: Represents the exception that is thrown when an XML Web service method is called over SOAP and an exception occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是公共语言运行时引发，或者引发由 XML Web 服务方法。The can either be thrown by the common language runtime or by an XML Web service method. 公共语言运行时可以引发如果请求的响应格式不正确。The common language runtime can throw a if a response to a request is not formatted correctly. XML Web 服务方法可能会生成通过只需引发异常在 XML Web 服务方法。XML Web service methods can generate a by simply throwing an exception within the XML Web service method. 如果客户端通过 SOAP 访问该方法，此异常将在服务器上捕获并包装在一个新。If the client accessed the method over SOAP, the exception is caught on the server and wrapped inside a new . 引发具有以下属性值：The thrown has the following property values: |PropertyProperty|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||原始异常的属性。The property of the original exception.| ||。.| ||XML Web 服务方法的 URL。The URL of the XML Web service method.| ||`null`但存在错误元素中的空的详细信息元素。`null`, but an empty detail element is present in the fault element.| XML Web 服务方法可能会引发时客户端调用使用 SOAP。An XML Web service method might throw a when clients call using SOAP. 如果 XML Web 服务将引发，可以通过添加其他详细信息，和属性，否则不能设置由 XML Web 服务方法，如果引发异常的另一种类型。If an XML Web service throws the , other details can be added through the , and properties that cannot otherwise be set by an XML Web service method if another type of exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例将引发XML Web 服务方法在其中设置属性。The following example throws a where the XML Web service method sets the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapException Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapException Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性只能使用接受的构造函数之一进行设置参数。The property can only be set using one of the constructors that accepts an argument. 发出 SOAP 请求后，将消息发送给收件人，SOAP 执行组件属性中指定。When a SOAP request is made, the message is sent to a recipient, which is specified in a SOAP actor attribute. 如果 XML Web 服务中发生异常，SOAP 执行组件属性的值分配给属性。If an exception occurs within an XML Web service, the value of the SOAP actor attribute is assigned to the property. 对于使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web 服务，XML Web 服务方法的 URL 是 SOAP 执行组件属性的值，将返回在属性。For XML Web services created using ASP.NET, the URL to the XML Web service method is the value of the SOAP actor attribute and is returned in the property. 有关 SOAP 参与者属性的详细信息，请参阅[SOAP](https://www.w3.org/TR/soap/)规范。For more information on the SOAP actor attribute, see the [SOAP](https://www.w3.org/TR/soap/) specification. ## Examples 下面的 Web 窗体示例调用`Math`XML Web 服务方法，将引发异常，如果发生被零除。The following Web Form example calls the `Math` XML Web service method, which throws an exception if a division by zero occurs. Web 窗体引发异常时，会捕获此异常，并输出异常详细信息，包括并属性，到控件。When the exception is thrown, the Web Form catches the exception and outputs the exception details, including the and properties, into an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapException.Actor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapException.Actor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 为了使上面的 Web 窗体使用以下`Math`Web 服务示例，一个命名空间的`MyMath`代理类的创建过程中指定。In order for the preceding Web Form to use the following `Math` Web Service example, a namespace of `MyMath` was specified during the creation of the proxy class. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapException.Actor Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapException.Actor Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: Specifies a SOAP fault code that represents a client call that is not formatted correctly or does not contain the appropriate information.

span.span: Specifies a SOAP fault code that represents a client call that is not formatted correctly or does not contain the appropriate information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 举例说明何时可以生成，是当客户端的调用不具有正确的身份验证或付款信息。An example of when a can be generated, is when a client call does not have proper authentication or payment information. 它通常是客户端调用都必须是表示它重新发送之前更改。It is generally an indication that the client call must be changed before it is resent. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapException.Detail Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Detail Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapException.Detail Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Detail Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: Gets the type of SOAP fault code.

span.span: Gets the type of SOAP fault code.

value.span: 指定出现的 SOAP 错误代码。

span.span: An that specifies the SOAP fault code that occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建的新实例时，才可以设置属性类。The property can only be set when creating a new instance of the class. 类是用于通过 SOAP 调用 XML Web 服务方法的 XML Web 服务客户端使用。The class is for use by XML Web service clients that call XML Web service methods over SOAP. ASP.NET 会处理是否调用客户端使用 SOAP。ASP.NET handles whether the client that calls uses SOAP. 这是在 XML Web 服务中发生异常时。This is when an exception occurs in an XML Web service. 如果客户端使用 SOAP，ASP.NET 将包装到的特定异常，并设置和属性。If the client uses SOAP, ASP.NET wraps the specific exception into a and sets the and properties. 一组的可用代码，为 SOAP 协议版本 1.1 中，名为 SOAP 错误代码如下所示：The set of available codes, known as SOAP Fault Codes for SOAP protocol version 1.1, are the following: |项Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||找到无效的 SOAP 信封的命名空间。An invalid namespace for a SOAP envelope was found.| ||并非所有的 SOAP 元素需要进行处理。Not all SOAP elements require processing. 但是，如果 SOAP 元素标记与`MustUnderstand`属性值为 1，也需要。However, if a SOAP element is marked with the `MustUnderstand` attribute with a value of 1, it is required. 失败以处理该元素将生成此异常。Failure to process the element generates this exception.| ||客户端调用的格式不正确或不包含相应的信息。A client call was not formatted correctly or did not contain the appropriate information. 例如，客户端调用可能没有正确的身份验证或付款信息。For example, the client call might not have the proper authentication or payment information. 它通常是指示该消息必须更改之前重新发送它。It is generally an indication that the message must be changed before it is resent.| ||在服务器上，客户端调用的处理期间出错但是，问题不是由于消息内容。An error occurred during the processing of a client call on the server, however, the problem is not due to the message contents. 例如，由于网络问题而请求可能不响应的上游服务器。For example, an upstream server might not respond to a request due to network problems. 通常情况下，使用此类型的异常，客户端调用可能稍后会成功。Typically, with this type of exception, the client call might succeed later. 如果 XML Web 服务引发异常，而不，并使用 SOAP 的客户端调用，ASP.NET 将转换到的异常，并设置属性设置为，并返回到客户端引发。If an XML Web service throws an exception, other than and the client calls using SOAP, ASP.NET converts the exception to a , setting the property to and throws it back to the client.| ## Examples 下面的 Web 窗体示例调用`Math`Web 服务方法，将引发异常，如果发生被零除。The following Web Form example calls the `Math` Web Service method, which throws an exception if a division by zero occurs. Web 窗体后引发该异常，会捕获此异常，并输出异常详细信息，包括并属性存储到控件。Once the exception is thrown, the Web Form catches the exception and outputs the exception details, including the and properties into a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[classic soapexception.actor example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[classic soapexception.actor example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 为了使上面的 Web 窗体使用以下`Math`XML Web 服务示例，一个命名空间的`MyMath`代理类的创建过程中指定。In order for the preceding Web Form to use the following `Math` XML Web service example, a namespace of `MyMath` was specified during the creation of the proxy class. [!code-aspx-csharp[classic soapexception.actor example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[classic soapexception.actor example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: Gets an that represents the application-specific error information details.

span.span: Gets an that represents the application-specific error information details.

value.span: 应用程序特定的错误信息。

span.span: The application-specific error information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以设置使用一个类构造函数接受值。The property can be set using one of the class constructors that accepts a value. 属性用于提供特定于应用程序错误详细信息与相关`Body`SOAP 请求的元素。The property is used to supply application-specific error details related to the `Body` element of the SOAP request. 根据 SOAP 规范，如果出现错误的原因无法处理客户端请求因`Body`元素的 SOAP 请求，属性必须设置。According to the SOAP specification, if an error occurs because the client request cannot be processed due to the `Body` element of the SOAP request, the property must be set. 如果 SOAP 请求的标头条目中发生错误，则必须引发，以便在 SOAP 标头中返回错误详细信息。If an error occurs in the header entries of the SOAP request, you must throw a , so that the error details are returned in the SOAP header. 如果没有出现错误，由于在处理`Body`元素，则不能设置属性。If the error does not occur, due to the processing of the `Body` element, then the property must not be set. 在构建有关属性，和的属性可用于确保与 SOAP 规范保持一致。In building an for the property, the and properties of can be used to ensure consistency with the SOAP specification. 所有直接子元素的详细信息元素称为详细条目，详细信息的每个条目被编码为详细信息元素中的某个独立元素。All immediate child elements of the detail element are called detail entries and each detail entry is encoded as an independent element within the detail element. ## Examples 下面的示例将引发、 XML Web 服务方法在其中设置属性。The following example throws a , where the XML Web service method sets the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapException.Detail#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Detail Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapException.Detail#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Detail Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 收件人可以使用此方法以确定是否属性在功能上等效于`Client`而不考虑使用的 SOAP 协议版本 SOAP 1.1 中定义的 SOAP 错误代码。Recipients of a can use this method to determine whether the property is functionally equivalent to the `Client` SOAP fault code defined in SOAP 1.1 regardless of the version of the SOAP protocol used. 版本的 SOAP 协议 1.1 可能使用不同的名称或命名空间为稍后`Client`SOAP 错误代码定义在 SOAP 1.1 版中，由表示字段。Versions of the SOAP protocol later than 1.1 might use different names or namespaces for the `Client` SOAP fault code defined in SOAP version 1.1, which is represented by the field. SOAP 1.2 命名的名称的错误代码`Sender`，这由字段。SOAP 1.2 names the fault code `Sender`, which is represented by the field.

SOAP 1.2 错误代码命名相同的名称;但是它的作用域由不同的 XML 命名空间，由表示字段。SOAP 1.2 names the fault code the same; however it is scoped by a different XML namespace and is represented by the field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并非所有的 SOAP 元素需要由服务器进行处理。Not all SOAP elements require processing by the server. 但是，如果 SOAP 元素将标有`MustUnderstand`属性等于 1 或`true`，所需的处理。However, if a SOAP element is marked with the `MustUnderstand` attribute equal to 1 or `true`, processing is required. 无法处理元素生成与。Failure to process the element generates a with a .

summary.span: Gets a URI that represents the piece of code that caused the exception.

span.span: Gets a URI that represents the piece of code that caused the exception.
The piece of code that caused the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 协议 1.1 版使用与 XML Web 服务进行通信时，将忽略属性。The property is ignored when the SOAP protocol version 1.1 is used to communicate with an XML Web service. 当使用 SOAP 1.2 时，属性集`node`元素内的`fault`SOAP 消息的元素。When SOAP 1.2 is used, the property sets the `node` element within a `fault` element of a SOAP message. 和属性这两个标识导致异常的代码段的; 它们只是指其 SOAP 1.1 和 SOAP 1.2 名称分别。The and properties both identify the piece of code that caused the exception; they just refer to their SOAP 1.1 and SOAP 1.2 names respectively. 由于它们都引用相同的属性值，应用程序可以只访问属性。Because they both refer to the same property value, applications can just access the property. 这些属性的值由接受的构造函数设置`actor`参数。The value of these properties is set by the constructors that accept an `actor` parameter.

summary.span: Specifies that a SOAP fault code that represents an error occurred during the processing of a client call on the server, where the problem is not due to the message contents.

span.span: Specifies that a SOAP fault code that represents an error occurred during the processing of a client call on the server, where the problem is not due to the message contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个可能会发生，例如，如果被调用的服务器无法响应请求，因为网络问题。A might occur, for example, if a server being called cannot respond to a request due to network problems. 通常情况下，使用此类型的异常，客户端调用可能稍后会成功。Typically, with this type of exception, the client call might succeed later. 如果 XML Web 服务引发异常，而不，并且客户端是否正在通信与 XML Web 服务使用 SOAP 协议，ASP.NET 将返回 SOAP 错误。If an XML Web service throws an exception, other than the , and the client is communicating with the XML Web service using the SOAP protocol, ASP.NET returns a SOAP fault. 客户端计算机上运行.NET Framework 将转换到该 SOAP 错误，并设置属性设置为，并向客户端引发该异常。The .NET Framework running on the client machine converts that SOAP fault into a , setting the property to , and throws that exception to the client.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode SubCode { get; }

summary.span: Gets the optional error information contained in the XML element of a SOAP fault.

span.span: Gets the optional error information contained in the XML element of a SOAP fault.

value.span: 表示 SOAP 错误的 XML 元素内容的 。

span.span: A that represents the contents of the XML element of a SOAP fault.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 协议 1.1 版使用与 XML Web 服务进行通信时，将忽略属性。The property is ignored when the SOAP protocol version 1.1 is used to communicate with an XML Web service. 表示的内容的属性`code`元素指定使用有限的数量的指定的 SOAP 协议的预定义的错误代码，而出现的错误类型的可选`subcode`元素允许应用程序提供特定于应用程序的用户定义的错误代码。The property that represents the contents of the `code` element specifies the type of error that occurred using a limited number of pre-defined error codes specified by the SOAP protocol, whereas the optional `subcode` element allows an application to provide user-defined error codes specific to the application. ASP.NET，定义两个此类代码，由和字段。ASP.NET defines two such codes that are represented by the and fields.

summary.span: A SOAP fault code that represents an invalid namespace for a SOAP envelope was found during the processing of the SOAP message.

span.span: A SOAP fault code that represents an invalid namespace for a SOAP envelope was found during the processing of the SOAP message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 信封是表示 SOAP 消息的 XML 文档的顶级元素。A SOAP envelope is the top-level element of an XML document that represents a SOAP message.
